alert.note: Alert for Northern Lycoming; Potter; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 10:05PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN LYCOMING...POTTER AND TIOGA COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM EDT... At 1004 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line moving into western Potter County. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Wellsboro, Wharton, Morris, Coudersport, Elkland, Blossburg, Galeton, Westfield, Genesee, Gaines, Covington, Arnot, Millerton, Harrison Valley, Leonard Harrison State Park, Denton Hill State Park, Ole Bull State Park, Lyman Run State Park and Keeneyville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
